729327f-b.title: Richmond: Richmond Avenue - Church Street
729327f-b.text:
(1)
Richmond Avenue, west side, at the head of Church Street, showing the Dutch Raformed Church. It stands on the site of the church that burned down during the Revolution.
N222. N.~ E.460A. ..: (E 42--~
About 1910
By Mulford Simonson
From P.L.Sperr Collection
(2)  and (3)
Viewing from Church Street. Views 2 and 3 were taken
the same day.
1924
P.L.8perr
729327f-b.folder: Richmond Avenue & Church Street, Staten Island, NY
